issue.title: Gazebo compilation broken without libgtest present

content.raw:
There's another slightly related issue, gtest library is not specified as static or shared library.  By default cmake builds static libraries, but if one accidentally sets `BUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON`, then gazebo build fails, unless one modifies [test CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/3e5fb38a404efadc6e01eb5255178f94d8f2b3b3/test/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-33) by adding `STATIC`:

~~~
add_library(gtest STATIC gtest/src/gtest-all.cc)
add_library(gtest_main STATIC gtest/src/gtest_main.cc)
~~~

Given the dependencies are expecting `libgtest*.a` static libs, should we go ahead make the changes above?
